description: Vice Admiral Monkey D. Garp is the father of Monkey D. Dragon, the grandfather of Monkey D. Luffy, and the adoptive grandfather of Portgas D. Ace. He was the man in charge of both Coby and Helmeppo. He was one of the major figures along with Sengoku, Shiki, and Whitebeard while Gol D. Roger was still alive.
name: Monkey D. Garp
